title: Update build badge links
body: We changed build definitions months and months ago, and should update the links.

commit.message:
Update build badge links

We changed build definitions months and months ago, and should update the links.

nodes.body:
We used to use a different definition for our CI build, with id `86`. Now we use id `887`. Before this change the links didn't go to the latest build:

![badges](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3347530/122593374-2fdb3b80-d02b-11eb-9031-2faec1888ab9.gif)
